Class CommunitySmartkey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkware.smartcrypt.keymanagement.smartkeys.AbstractSmartkey
      • com.pkware.smartcrypt.keymanagement.smartkeys.CommunitySmartkey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Smartkey

    public final class CommunitySmartkey
extends AbstractSmartkey
    A Smartkey owned by the server and used for PKWARE Smartcrypt PDE.

      • CommunitySmartkey

        public CommunitySmartkey(String urn,
                         String name,
                         Map<Integer,SecretKey> keys,
                         List<Feature> features,
                         List<KnownUser> participants,
                         boolean canManage,
                         @Nullable
                         MetaClientException encryptionError,
                         @Nullable
                         MetaClientException decryptionError)
        Parameters:
        keys - Ownership of this collection, and of the keys within, is claimed by this object. DO NOT MODIFY THE COLLECTION OR KEYS OUTSIDE OF THIS OBJECT AFTER INSTANTIATING. Accordingly, create defensive copies before invoking this constructor.
        features - Ownership of this collection is claimed by this object. Accordingly, create defensive copies before invoking this constructor.
        participants - Ownership of this collection is claimed by this object. Accordingly, create defensive copies before invoking this constructor.
        encryptionError - null indicates encryption is allowed; otherwise, this exception will be thrown when encryption is attempted using this key
        decryptionError - null indicates decryption is allowed; otherwise, this
